templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasNominee
templateElements.title: Is there someone who helps {panel.creditorPersonName} manage their money and legal decisions?
templateElements.description: This person would be considered {panel.creditorPersonName}'s `Nominee`. If {panel.creditorPersonName}'s Nominee is not alive anymore, select "NO".

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasNomineeNoExplanation
templateElements.title:
Because {panel.creditorPersonName} is not `mentally competent`, but they do not have a `nominee`, you need to let {panel.creditorPersonName} know directly that you are applying for a `Representation Grant`.

This service will tell you how to let them know in a later step.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonNomineeName
templateElements.title: What is the name of the person who helps {panel.creditorPersonName} manage their money and legal decisions?
templateElements.description: This name should be written using the Roman alphabet. English and French are examples of languages that use the Roman alphabet.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonNomineeFormal
templateElements.title: Was {panel.creditorPersonNomineeName} formally appointed to help {panel.creditorPersonName} manage their money and legal decisions?
templateElements.description:
These are the ways someone can be formally appointed.
  • {panel.creditorPersonName} could have signed a document that gave someone else the power of attorney using the Power of Attorney Act,
  • {panel.creditorPersonName} could have signed a document that appointed someone as a representative using the Representation Agreement Act, or
  • a person can be appointed by the Court using the Patients Property Act,
  • a person could have been appointed either the Minister of Aboriginal Affairs and Northern Development or by the Court using the Indian Act

templateElements.name: creditorPersonNomineeFormalYesExplanation
templateElements.title:
The Public Guardian and Trustee (PGT) will need a copy of the legal document that proves that {panel.creditorPersonNomineeName} was formally appointed as {panel.creditorPersonName}'s `nominee`.

You can get a head start by asking {panel.creditorPersonNomineeName} for that document now, or, you can wait for this service to remind you in a later step.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonNomineeFormalNoExplanation
templateElements.title:
Even if {panel.creditorPersonNomineeName} was not formally appointed to help {panel.creditorPersonName}, it is still best to let both {panel.creditorPersonNomineeName} and {panel.creditorPersonName} know that you are applying for a `Representation Grant`.

This service will tell you how to let them know in a later step.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonIsDeadExplanation
templateElements.title:
Because {panel.creditorPersonName} has died, {panel.creditorPersonName}'s `personal representative` needs to know that you are applying for a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName}.

It is your responsibility to check with {panel.creditorPersonName}'s family and friends to find out who is {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative.

If you find out that {panel.creditorPersonName} does not have a `personal representative`, this service will help you tell that to The Court.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRep
templateElements.title: Do you know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`?
templateElements.description:
If {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative is not alive anymore, contact that person's personal representative to find out who is now representing {panel.creditorPersonName}.

If someone is planning on becoming {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative but hasn't done so yet, it is safer for you to include them as {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative.

choices.text: I know {panel.creditorPersonName} does NOT have a personal representative
I don't know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a personal representative

templateElements.title: What is the name of {panel.creditorPersonName}'s `personal representative`?
templateElements.description: This name should be written using the Roman alphabet. English and French are examples of languages that use the Roman alphabet.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepYesExplanation
templateElements.title:
Because {panel.creditorPersonName} has died, {panel.creditorPersonPersonalRepName} needs to know that you are applying for a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName}.

This service will tell you how to let {panel.creditorPersonPersonalRepName} know in a later step.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepNoTempError
templateElements.title: For now, this service has only been developed for a limited number of situations. At this time, this service cannot help you apply for a `Representation Grant`.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKExplanation
templateElements.title:
You are responsible for knowing for sure if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`.

Because you are not sure if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a personal representative, it is safer for you to check with as many of {panel.creditorPersonName}'s family and friends as you can find.

You want as much transparency in your application as possible in case {panel.creditorPersonName} does have a personal representative and The Court doesn't think you've given enough people a fair chance.

templateElements.title: What did {panel.creditorPersonName}'s family or friends tell you about {panel.creditorPersonName}'s `personal representative`?

choices.text: they told me {panel.creditorPersonName} <b>has a personal representative
they told me {panel.creditorPersonName} does NOT have a personal representative
they told me they don't know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a personal representative

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKFamilyConfirmedYesExplanation
templateElements.title:
Scroll back up to the question:
  • Do you know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`?
Change your answer to:
  • I know {panel.creditorPersonName} has a personal representative

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKFamilyConfirmedNoExplanation
templateElements.title:
Scroll back up to the question:
  • Do you know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`?
Change your answer to:
  • I know {panel.creditorPersonName} does NOT have a personal representative

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKFamilyConfirmedDKExplanation
templateElements.title:
If {panel.creditorPersonName}'s family or friends do not know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`, you can hire professional investigators to try and find out for sure.

Examples of professional investigators include private investigators, heir tracers and other similar services.

You do not have to hire a professional investigator if you don't want to.

The reason you may want to hire a professional investigator is to show The Court that you did all you could to find {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative.

The Court will ultimately decide whether or not you have made enough of an effort to find {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative.

If you do hire a professional investigator, you will need to pay their fees yourself. If The Court gives you a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName}, you will be able to get that money back from {deceasedName}'s `estate`.

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKHireInvestigator
templateElements.title: Do you want to hire a professional investigator to find out if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`?

templateElements.name: creditorPersonHasPersonalRepDKHireInvestigatorNoExplanation
templateElements.title:
You may be risking a delay to your application if {panel.creditorPersonName}'s family or friends don't know for sure if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative` and you don't keep investigating.

If the Court does not think that you did all you could to find {panel.creditorPersonName}'s personal representative, they may ask you to hire a professional investigator before they will give a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName}.

If you don't want to hire a professional investigator right now, scroll back up to the question:
  • Do you know if {panel.creditorPersonName} has a `personal representative`?
Change your answer to:
  • I know {panel.creditorPersonName} does NOT have a personal representative
